content.title: Mukhyamantri Avivahita Pension Yojana
content.department: Department of Social Justice and Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities
content.beneficiary: Unmarried women above 50 years of age
content.details: Madhya Pradesh government has started the 'Mukhyamantri Avivahit Pension Yojana' to help unmarried women who are alone. The government will provide a pension of ₹ 600 every month to help them live independently and improve their social and economic status.
eligibility: Applicants should be a native of Madhya Pradesh State.
The applicants should be unmarried women.
Applicant's age should be 50 years or more.
Applicants should not be income taxpayers.
Applicants should not be a government employee/officer.
Applicants should not be honorary employees working in government/non-government offices.
content.application_process: Offline and Online. Applicants can apply in the prescribed format along with necessary documents at the office of the designated officer, Gram Panchayat, or Public Service Center.

faqs.question: What is this scheme?
faqs.answer: Madhya Pradesh State Government started the 'Mukhyamantri Avivahita Pension Yojana' for unmarried women of the state.

faqs.question: What is the financial benefit amount?
Is the scholarship amount given every month?
faqs.answer: Yes, the benefit amount will be given every month.

faqs.question: Who can get the benefits?
faqs.answer: Madhya Pradesh unmarried women who fulfill the eligibility criteria.

faqs.question: What is the age eligibility?
faqs.answer: Applicant's age should be 50 years or more.

faqs.question: Is this scheme benefit only for Madhya Pradesh State?
faqs.answer: Yes, applicants should be a native of Madhya Pradesh State.

faqs.question: How to apply online?
faqs.answer: Go to the link https://socialsecurity.mp.gov.in/Home.aspx and follow the steps given in the scheme.

faqs.question: What documents are required while submitting the application form?
faqs.answer: Aadhar card, Samagra card, Address proof, Bank account statement, Passport size photo, Mobile number.

faqs.question: What is the financial eligibility criteria?
faqs.answer: Applicants should not be income taxpayers.
